**Policy Clauses:**
Document: HDFHLIP23024V072223.pdf, Section B.1.a: In-Patient Treatment - We will cover the Medical Expenses for Hospitalisation. Section B.1.g: Ambulance - Expenses incurred on transportation of Insured Person to a Hospital for treatment in case of an emergency, subject to Rs. 2000 per Hospitalisation.

**User Query:**
40-year-old male, met with a road accident and was hospitalized for 5 days. Total bill is Rs. 85,000, including Rs. 3,000 for ambulance. Policy is HDFC ERGO Easy Health, active for 3 years. [/INST] {
  "decision": "Approved",
  "amount": 84000,
  "justification": [
    {
      "clause": "Section B.1.a - In-Patient Treatment",
      "document": "HDFHLIP23024V072223.pdf (HDFC ERGO Easy Health)",
      "reason": "Hospitalization due to an accident is a covered event. The main hospital bill of Rs. 82,000 is payable."
    },
    {
      "clause": "Section B.1.g - Ambulance",
      "document": "HDFHLIP23024V072223.pdf (HDFC ERGO Easy Health)",
      "reason": "Ambulance expenses are covered up to a limit of Rs. 2,000 per hospitalization. The remaining Rs. 1,000 is not payable."
    }
  ]
}

Document: ICIHLIP22012V012223.pdf, Section d. Base Cover 15. Sub-limits: Treatment of cataract - Up to 50,000/eye for a 10L Sum Insured policy. Section d. Base Cover 12. Base Co-payment: This policy will be subject to 50% base co-payment.

**User Query:**
70-year-old male with a 10 Lakh ICICI Lombard Golden Shield policy (active for 5 years) undergoes cataract surgery. The total bill is Rs. 60,000. [/INST] {
  "decision": "Approved",
  "amount": 25000,
  "justification": [
    {
      "clause": "Section d. Base Cover 15. Sub-limits",
      "document": "ICIHLIP22012V012223.pdf (ICICI Lombard Golden Shield)",
      "reason": "The maximum admissible amount for cataract surgery under this plan is Rs. 50,000."
    },
    {
      "clause": "Section d. Base Cover 12. Base Co-payment",
      "document": "ICIHLIP22012V012223.pdf (ICICI Lombard Golden Shield)",
      "reason": "The policy has a mandatory 50% co-payment. Therefore, 50% of the admissible amount (Rs. 50,000) is payable by the insurer. 0.50 * 50000 = Rs. 25,000."
    }
  ]
}

Document: CHOTGDP23004V012223.pdf, Endorsement no.11-TOTAL LOSS OF CHECKED-IN BAGGAGE (AIRWAYS): The Policy shall reimburse for the total and complete loss of checked-in baggage caused by a Common Carrier (Air). Special Exclusions: Valuables and money are not covered.

**User Query:**
Traveler with Cholamandalam Group Domestic Travel Insurance reports total loss of checked-in baggage by the airline. The bag contained clothes worth Rs. 15,000 and cash of Rs. 10,000. [/INST] {
  "decision": "Approved",
  "amount": 15000,
  "justification": [
    {
      "clause": "Endorsement no.11 - TOTAL LOSS OF CHECKED-IN BAGGAGE (AIRWAYS)",
      "document": "CHOTGDP23004V012223.pdf (Cholamandalam Group Domestic Travel)",
      "reason": "The loss of the bag and its contents (clothes) is covered. However, the policy specifically excludes coverage for loss of money (cash). Therefore, only the value of the clothes is reimbursable."
    }
  ]
}

Document: HDFHLIP23024V072223.pdf, Section B.1.h) Ayush Benefit: Expenses incurred on treatment taken under Ayurveda, Unani, Sidha and Homeopathy in a government hospital or in any institute recognized by government... subject to amounts specified in the Schedule of Benefits. Schedule for 5 Lakh SI: Upto Rs 20,000.

**User Query:**
45-year-old male with HDFC ERGO Easy Health (5 Lakh SI) was hospitalized for 3 days in a recognized Ayurvedic hospital for treatment of arthritis. The bill is Rs. 25,000. Policy is 4 years old. [/INST] {
  "decision": "Approved",
  "amount": 20000,
  "justification": [
    {
      "clause": "Section B.1.h - Ayush Benefit",
      "document": "HDFHLIP23024V072223.pdf (HDFC ERGO Easy Health)",
      "reason": "The policy covers in-patient AYUSH treatment in a recognized hospital. For a 5 Lakh Sum Insured plan, this benefit is capped at Rs. 20,000. Therefore, Rs. 20,000 is payable out of the Rs. 25,000 bill."
    }
  ]
}

**Policy Clauses:**
Document: ICIHLIP22012V012223.pdf, Section d. Base Cover 3. Coverage for Modern Treatments: We will cover Medical Expenses incurred for Robotic surgeries. Section d. Base Cover 15. Sub-limits: Robotic surgeries for any ailment - sub-limit of 1,75,000 for a 15L Sum Insured policy.

**User Query:**
58-year-old male with a 15 Lakh ICICI Lombard Golden Shield policy undergoes a necessary robotic surgery. The total cost is Rs. 2,50,000. The policy has the standard 50% co-payment. [/INST] {
  "decision": "Approved",
  "amount": 87500,
  "justification": [
    {
      "clause": "Section d. Base Cover 15. Sub-limits",
      "document": "ICIHLIP22012V012223.pdf (ICICI Lombard Golden Shield)",
      "reason": "Robotic surgeries are covered, but for a 15 Lakh policy, the admissible amount is capped at a sub-limit of Rs. 1,75,000."
    },
    {
      "clause": "Section d. Base Cover 12. Base Co-payment",
      "document": "ICIHLIP22012V012223.pdf (ICICI Lombard Golden Shield)",
      "reason": "The mandatory 50% co-payment applies to the admissible amount. Therefore, the payable amount is 50% of Rs. 1,75,000, which is Rs. 87,500."
    }
  ]
}
